price: E os que eles invocam, além de Allah, nada criam, enquanto eles mesmos são criados.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَخۡلُقُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yadʿūna min dūni al-lahi lā yakhluqūna shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
